subject: help tcc+junit
msgSnippet: we use tcc test webapplication, write some user defined testcase,when run this testcase,it but can t start the testserver ,the error
messageBody:
we use tcc test webapplication, write some user defined testcase,when run this testcase,it but can't start the testserver ,the error massage:java.lang.NoSuchMethodError at com.togethersoft.testing.internal.testserver.TestServerStartup.([DashoPro-V2-050200]) at java.lang.Class.newInstance0(Native Method) at java.lang.Class.newInstance(Class.java:232) at com.togethersoft.testing.TestServer.(TestServer.java:104) at com.togethersoft.testing.TestServer.main(TestServer.java:134)Error: nullTest server startup failed. Please verify your installation and application parameters.If you recieve address already in use error message, please change value of testserver.port property.Your application parameters should include: -Dtestserver.port= -Dtestserver.home=
File accessibility.properties should be present in JAVA_HOME/jre/lib.File testingbootstrap.jar should be present in JAVA_HOME/jre/lib/ext.Parameter -Dtestserver.port should be set to valid port number.Optional parameter -Dtestingframework.plugin.home should point to 'plugin' directory.By default testserver assumes that 'plugin' subdirectory is present where testserver.jar is located.Please check testserver.log for addiitonal information about error.who can help me?

---------------------------------
